text:
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
January 19, 19^0
PHONE wo s-ens
DIRECTOR
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
JAN 2 0 1960
Dr. Harry J. Skomia, President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
Ik Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Your letter of January 15 addressed to Mr. White, Secretary of
this Foundation, has been handed to me by Mr. White, and we were
somewhat puzzled until we examined the letter more carefully and
then decided that this is a form letter which perhaps inadvertently
was sent to this Foundation. Is our conclusion right, or is there
some other explanation?
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
MFSrjf
enclosure
